articles.author: ROD MCGUIRK Associated Press
articles.title: Australian Parliament bans social media for under-16s with world-first law - ABC News
articles.description: The Australian Parliament has passed a social media ban for young children in a world-first law
articles.content:
MELBOURNE, Australia -- A social media ban for children under 16 passed the Australian Parliament on Friday in a world-first law.
The law will make platforms including TikTok, Facebook, Snapchat, Re… [+6063 chars]
